column1: # TSV file of geolocation rules with the format:
# '<raw_geolocation><tab><annotated_geolocation>' where the raw and annotated geolocations
# If creating a general rule, then the raw field value can be substituted with '*'
# Lines starting with '#' will be ignored as comments.
# Trailing '#' will be ignored as comments.
Africa/Democratic Republic of the Congo/Province Bandundu/*
Africa/Democratic Republic of the Congo/Province Equateur/*
Africa/Democratic Republic of the Congo/Province Kasai Occidental/*
Africa/Democratic Republic of the Congo/Province Kasai Oriental/*
Africa/Democratic Republic of the Congo/Province P. Oriental/*
# There's a few Liberia samples which have the division field as `<location>, <division>`
# The <location> is often overly specific -- e.g. 'battery factory', 'st paul bridge' so I've
# dropped them where I see fit. Update as required.
# `buchanan` is also misspelt. P.S. Buchanan used to be called Grand Bassa, which is also the province
# There's >100 division='Kailahun' and a single division="Kailahun District"
